meanings.definition: To send or direct (something) to the wrong place or person.
meanings.sent1: The package was misrouted to the incorrect address.
meanings.sent2: She misrouted the email to the wrong department.
meanings.sent3: The misrouted letter ended up in the neighbor's mailbox!
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were misrouted, leading to confusion.
meanings.sent5: The misrouted package took a detour before reaching its destination.

meanings.definition: Sent or directed to the wrong place or person.
meanings.sent1: The misrouted package finally arrived at the correct address.
meanings.sent2: She received the misrouted letter meant for her neighbor.
meanings.sent3: The misrouted email caused a mix-up in the office.
meanings.sent4: His misrouted luggage made its way back to him eventually.
meanings.sent5: The misrouted shipment was redirected and reached its destination.
